msbt.message: Lunar New Year may not be as big a deal here as Countdown was, but any day on this island is a good one.
In many parts of the world, the Lunar New Year is a time for a traditional big family reunion Aw, now I miss my parents
In some parts of the world, today was once the start of a new year.Hmmm Maybe a good time to think about how I'm doing on my New Year's resolutions so far.

Today's the start of a new lunar year. Kind of funny, celebrating the moon on a night when we can't even see it. Still, it's nice to look forward to another whole year of seeing the moon wax and wane overhead
It might be fun to put together a Lunar New Year dinner, getting all our friends on the island together.If only I'd done all the planning needed for something like that. Maybe next Lunar New Year
